note.p: Birth: St Albans, Hertfordshire, England (07 March 1746)
Burial: Churchyard of Leyton parish church

Career: Entered Royal Navy (1760); left and joined the HEIC, and retired on the fortune acquired during two voyages; Elder Brother of Trinity (1788); Deputy Master of Trinity (1803); Director, HEIC (1795-1823); Chairman, HEIC (1803)
